caption.p: Charactering the effect of heat stress on quality of starch in terms of amylolytic activity in developing grains and harvested seeds of contrasting wheat cultivars, (a) total amylolytic activity in developing grains and harvested seeds of wheat cvs. HD3086 and BT-Schomburgk under HS, (b) In-gel activity assay for analyzing the isoenzymes of amylases in developing grains of wheat cvs. HD3086 and BT-Schomburgk under HS, (c) In-gel activity assay for analysing the isoenzymes of amylases in harvested seeds of wheat cvs. HD3086 and BT-Schomburgk under HS; C - 22 ± 3℃, HS - 38℃, 2 h; vertical bars indicate s.e (n = 3).
